Fractalide-Releases.description: High level description of all releases.

releases.title: PASCAL
releases.description: The PASCAL release represents the initial release of Hyperflow. It implements the basic infrastructure which allows the building and execution of Fractalide applications in Hyperflow.

features.title: Hyperflow MVP
Objectives: Design Mode displays a basic text editor
Graph Mode displays graphs as text only
Basic structure of Hyperflow in place
Work Done: Agent, graph and node interface implemented

features.title: Hyperflow Alpha
Objectives: Design Mode includes a basic debugger
Improved Graph editing in graph mode, possibly with rudimentary graphical movable components

features.title: Hyperflow Beta
Objectives: Support for multiple platforms (Mac OS, Linux and Windows 10)

features.title: Hyperflow Stable
Objectives: Hyperflow has been upgraded to use typed/racket as much as possible
The scheduler and core nodes makes use of dependent types that formally specify the system for heightened security

releases.title: FIBONACCI
releases.description: The FIBONACCI release builds out the first user facing Fractalide applications.
